translation.en: [Dib] I used to look up at space
with hope and wonder in my eyes.
Until space looked back.
Invader Zim,
evil, alien soldier of the Irken Empire
translation.zh: ‎是怒星帝国的邪恶外星战士

translation.en: sent by his diabolical masters, the Almighty Tallest,
to infiltrate Earth and prepare it for the coming invasion.
translation.zh: ‎渗透地球 为即将来临的入侵做准备

translation.en: Disguised as one of us,
he moved into my neighborhood,
he went to my school,
and with the help of his vile mechanical servants,
plotted to destroy everything we have,
-everything we are. -[helicopter whirring]
-[crowd shouting] -And then...
he vanished.
My name is Dib Membrane.
I'm 12 years old.
And I'm all that stands between Zim and the annihilation of our world.
translation.zh:
‎邪慕和世界毁灭之间
‎只有我这一道防线

translation.en: Prepare your starving, gurgling child-bellies
for the awesome eventuality of dinner!
translation.zh: ‎享受可能会令人食指大动的晚餐吧！

translation.en: Foodio 3000 hopes you love what I have made.
Also, what is love?
Looks great, Dad. I'm gonna eat that food.
translation.zh: ‎看着很棒啊 爸爸 我要吃

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Hold up now, daughter!
Isn't it time your brother joined us?
translation.zh: ‎是时候让你兄弟加入咱们吧？

translation.en: Oh, man, no.
Since Zim vanished, Dib's been in his room for, like, a million years.
translation.zh:
‎邪慕消失后
‎迪本在他的房间待了一百万年了

translation.en: I hardly recognize him anymore.
He just sits there in that chair getting grosser...
translation.zh: ‎他就坐在那把椅子上 越来越邋遢

translation.en: smellier.
[Professor Membrane] He sure does, but try to be more understanding.
translation.zh: ‎确实如此 但尽量多给一点理解

translation.en: Dib's finally letting go of his silly obsession
with aliens and ghosts and all his other non-scientific nonsense.
translation.zh: ‎外星人、鬼魂和其它不科学的瞎想

translation.en: And it's not easy for him.
Imagine if you stopped believing in, oh, video games.
translation.zh: ‎能想象你不再相信电子游戏吗？

translation.en: Don't even joke about that, Dad.
[Professor Membrane] Honey, letting go of silly ideas is just part of growing up.
translation.zh:
‎宝贝 放下愚蠢的想法
‎就是成长的一部分

translation.en: Why, as a child, I thought sharks were my friends.
translation.zh:
‎为何呢？因为我小的时候
‎以为鲨鱼是我的朋友

translation.en: [in ominous voice] I know better now.
[in normal voice] So, try to be more supportive. He's your brother, after all.
translation.zh:
‎所以尽量多给点支持
‎他毕竟是你兄弟

translation.en: Okay, Dad.
Hey, Dib! Dad says come to dinner!
translation.zh: ‎嘿 迪本！爸爸说来吃饭啦！

translation.en: [Dib] You know I can't leave my post, Gaz.
translation.zh: ‎你知道 我不能离开岗位 贾斯

translation.en: Just shove the food in here.
Where's the shoving stick? I can't shove without the shoving stick.
translation.zh:
‎推菜的棍子在哪？
‎没有棍子我没法推啊

translation.en: [Dib] Zim's still out there, Gaz, so I have to wait
translation.zh:
‎邪慕还在逍遥法外 贾斯
‎所以我得等着…

translation.en: and watch.
No one else will. They could never see the truth.
translation.zh:
‎别人都不会这样做 ‎他们永远看不到真相
‎但是为什么呢？

translation.en: Why, though? Brainwashing?
translation.zh:
‎他们永远看不到真相
‎但是为什么呢？ ‎洗脑？思想控制？

translation.en: Mind control?
[whispering] Brain-erasing ghosts?
Nobody believes me now, but I'll make them see.
translation.zh: ‎现在没人相信我 但我会让他们看见

translation.en: I'll expose Zim to the world, and open humanity's eyes
translation.zh: ‎我会将他公之于众 让人类看到

translation.en: to the danger they were in all along. [chuckles]
Even Dad, world-famous man of science will say,
translation.zh: ‎即便父亲 ‎世界著名的科学家都会说

translation.en: [in strange accent] "I believe you, Dib. I'm sorry I ever doubted you."
translation.zh: ‎“我相信你 迪本 抱歉我怀疑过你”

translation.en: That's the worst Dad impression ever,
but, Dib, let it go.
Zim's been gone a long time,
and as far as you know, he might just be gone for good.
translation.zh: ‎据你所知 他可能一去不回了

translation.en: I'd be willing to bet that Zim will never, ever...
translation.zh: ‎我愿意打赌 邪慕再也不会…

translation.en: Oh, wait, there he is.
[Dib screeches] It's Zim!
He's back! And he's doing stretches!
Nobody stretches like that unless they're warming up for evil!
translation.zh: ‎没人那样拉伸 除非是为做坏事热身

translation.en: This is it! The... [grunts]
moment I've been... [grunts and crashes]
waiting for!
[Gaz] What are you doing?
[groans] Gotta get to Zim!
Dib, no. Look at you.
The world's not ready to see what you've become.
translation.zh: ‎世界还没准备好看到你现在的样子

translation.en: You're hideous!
The smell!
needs me!
-Take a bath first! -[suit alarm blaring]
Take... [gags]
Take a bath!
No!
Zim!
Yes, it is I, and-- Hmm?
-Oh, wait, sorry. -[flies buzzing]
You'll have to move along, hideous goblin.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 给我走开 可怕的丑八怪

translation.en: I'm posing dramatically for when the Dib shows up.
translation.zh: ‎我这个夸张姿势是迪本出现时才摆的

translation.en: -I am Dib. -What?
-Give me a sec here. -[stammers] We know each other.
translation.zh:
‎-不过…
‎-等我一下 ‎我们互相认识

translation.en: -[thunder claps] -I've been expecting you, Dib!
I can tell. You set up sprinklers and everything.
translation.zh: ‎我可以看出来 你装了一些洒水装置

translation.en: -[gurgles] -You can't prove anything!
-Anyhow, I-- -Where have you been, Zim?
I've been monitoring your house, the school,
that taco place you love so much.
translation.zh: ‎学校 还有你特爱的墨西哥卷饼店

translation.en: No, no. GIR loves that place. I think it's dirty.
translation.zh:
‎才没有 女孩子爱那个地方
‎我觉得好脏

translation.en: -[GIR] I ate a baby there. -He did.
What have you been up to, Zim?
Phase one of my evil plan, human.
translation.zh: ‎我邪恶计划的第一阶段啊 人类

translation.en: Phase one.
Computer! Laugh with me! [Computer] I don't want to.
translation.zh:
‎-电脑 跟我一起笑
‎-我不想笑

translation.en: You've been in your house sitting in the toilet all this time?
translation.zh: ‎这段时间你一直在家 坐在厕所里？

translation.en: -Yes. -Like, the whole time?
That's right.
Did you have to sit in the toilet?
Do not try to understand the ways of my people, Dib!
translation.zh: ‎迪本 休想摸透我们的行事方式

translation.en: From the moment my mission began
translation.zh:
‎自从我在这个糟糕的星球
‎开展任务的那一刻起

translation.en: on this horrible planet, you've been there,
translation.zh:
‎自从我在这个糟糕的星球
‎开展任务的那一刻起 ‎你就阴魂不散 纠缠我每一步行动
‎像我的史穆斯奎子里的斯夸克

translation.en: haunting my every move like a squak in my shmoopsquizz.
translation.zh:
‎你就阴魂不散 纠缠我每一步行动
‎像我的史穆斯奎子里的斯夸克

translation.en: -A what in your huh? -Uh-huh!
And while the rest of your kind were easily fooled,
you were able to see through my brilliant disguise.
[stammers] Martha!
-[screeches] Eh? -The neighbor boy's an alien!
[stammers] Never mind, Martha. -He's normal. -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-没事的 玛莎 他是普通人
‎-好的

translation.en: I knew if I vanished for long enough, you'd just watch and wait,
translation.zh:
‎我知道只要消失得够久
‎你就会观察和等待

translation.en: your neglected body growing smelly
translation.zh: ‎你被忽视的身体就会越来越臭

translation.en: -and useless. -[Dib whimpering]
But that was only Phase One of my evil plan.
translation.zh: ‎但那只是我邪恶计划的第一阶段

translation.en: Well, keep watching, Dookie-Dib. Watch helplessly as I begin...
translation.zh:
‎继续看着吧 狗屁迪本
‎就无助地看着我开始

translation.en: Phase Two!
I'm switching people's mail around.
That's illegal. No!
I'm reading someone's newspaper. I don't pay for a subscription. [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎我在看别人的报纸 我没付订阅费

translation.en: Nobody reads newspapers anymore, but, no, stop!
translation.zh: ‎没人看报纸了 但不行 不准你看！

translation.en: Minimoose, get in on this mayhem!
That's my mom's pizza sticker.
She is crazy for pizza.
Hey, what... what are you... Hey, that... that's...
Hey, don't... Wait.
Don't! Don't! Don't!
Excellent.
Me! Me! Let me do one.
I launched that pug into space.
translation.zh: ‎我把那条巴哥犬发射到太空了

translation.en: -I thought you liked that pig. -[car alarm goes off]
-Why I do that? -What's the matter, human?
Why aren't you stopping me?
Can't fight back.
Sat too long.
Chair fused to butt.
More chair than man now.
Humans are such fragile, goopy things.
No Irken would ever become a chair.
Wait! Was that Phase Two?
Of course it was!
Probably. Uh... You know what? Now I'm not sure.
translation.zh: ‎也许吧 这么说吧 我现在也不确定

translation.en: Either way, you're helpless to stop me, Chair-Dib. So long!
translation.zh: ‎反正你都无力阻止 椅子迪本 再见！

translation.en: [both] Welcome home, son.
Zim!
Excellent work, me.
All is going according to plan, but there's still much to do, GIR.
translation.zh:
‎一切都照计划进行
‎但还有很多事要做 小铬

translation.en: Yes, sir! [shouts]
[shouts] I bloop you, Schmoopsy!
[chuckles warmly] Floopsy...
Computer?
[Computer groans] What?
Open a connection with the Almighty Tallest,
my leaders and biggest fans.
[Computer] Preparing to call The Tallest. You see, GIR, The Tallest--
translation.zh:
‎-准备呼叫最高陛下
‎-你瞧 小铬…

translation.en: [Computer] Now calling The Tallest!
The Tallest haven't heard from me,
their greatest and most incredible invader,
translation.zh:
‎没有听到他们最伟大
‎最不可思议的创新者

translation.en: in a very long time.
-They'll be sick with worry. -[GIR squeaks]
translation.zh: ‎他们会非常担心的 ‎（最高陛下）

translation.en: Hey, remember Invader Zim?
-Who? -Zim. Tiny?
Screamed a lot?
The guy that sends us the donuts?
No, that's Invader Jim. He's great.
translation.zh: ‎不对 那是入侵者吉姆 ‎他很棒

translation.en: Oh, wait. Zim.
-We hate him! -Yeah, that's him. [chuckles]
Remember the time we lied and told him
we were sending him on a secret mission to Earth,
translation.zh: ‎告诉他被派去地球执行秘密任务

translation.en: but really we were just getting rid of him because he's awful?
translation.zh:
‎但其实只是想摆脱他
‎因为他这人太烂了

translation.en: [laughs] Yeah. We're hilarious.
[comms officer] My Tallest, there's an incoming transmission.
translation.zh:
‎最高陛下？ ‎-有一个来电传输
‎-嗯

translation.en: Yep, life's been pretty great ever since Zim vanished for good.
translation.zh: ‎邪慕彻底消失后 日子真是挺惬意的

translation.en: Anyhow, send that transmission through.
I wonder who it could ever be. It is I, Zim!
translation.zh:
‎-想知道是谁呢
‎-是我 邪慕！

translation.en: My Tallest, you will be overjoyed to know
translation.zh:
‎最高陛下 ‎你们知道后会大喜过望的
‎迎接你们降临地球的巧妙计划

translation.en: Phase One of my most ingenious plan
translation.zh:
‎你们知道后会大喜过望的
‎迎接你们降临地球的巧妙计划

translation.en: to prepare Earth for your arrival was a success.
translation.zh:
‎你们知道后会大喜过望的
‎迎接你们降临地球的巧妙计划 ‎第一阶段已获得圆满成功

translation.en: Zim, we thought you were dead.
Could a dead Zim do this?
[clears throat] Sirs, my Earthly arch-nemesis is now a sad chair,
translation.zh:
‎长官 我在地球的主要劲敌
‎现在是一把悲伤的椅子

translation.en: leaving me free to complete the most diabolical phase of my plan,
translation.zh: ‎我能在计划中最邪恶的阶段

translation.en: Phase Two,
wherein I, uh...
Computer, put them on hold. Oh, no.
translation.zh: ‎计算机 让通话待机暂停 ‎不好 我真想不起第二阶段是什么了

translation.en: I really can't remember what Phase Two is.
translation.zh: ‎不好 我真想不起第二阶段是什么了

translation.en: I must have sat in that toilet too long. Think, Zim. Think.
translation.zh:
‎我肯定在厕所里蹲了太久
‎思考啊邪慕 思考

translation.en: We don't care, Zim.
[grunts] Why didn't I write it down?
Wait! Computer,
translation.zh:
‎我为什么没写下来…等等！ ‎计算机？
‎回放我讨论第二阶段的任何录像

translation.en: play back any recordings of me discussing Phase Two.
translation.zh:
‎计算机？
‎回放我讨论第二阶段的任何录像

translation.en: [Computer] One recording found.
Would you like me to record any and all mention of Phase Two?
translation.zh:
‎希望我记录任何
‎提到第二阶段的内容吗？

translation.en: No, thank you. Zim forgets nothing.
translation.zh: ‎不用 谢谢 邪慕从不健忘

translation.en: Hmm, besides reminding me how cool I look and sound,
translation.zh:
‎除了让我想起
‎自己形象和声音多么酷之外

translation.en: that was of no help.
He knows we can still see and hear him, right?
translation.zh: ‎他知道我们可以看到和听到他的吧？

translation.en: I liked when he was dead.
[shouts excitedly] I remember Phase Two!
You do? Good work, GIR! Tell me.
translation.zh: ‎是吗？ ‎干得好 小铬 告诉我

translation.en: You gonna order a million pizzas,
and then I gotta roll around in them pizzas,
and that's the story about how I turn into a giant pizza.
translation.zh: ‎那就是我如何变成巨大披萨的故事

translation.en: This isn't the time for the giant pizza story, GIR.
translation.zh: ‎这不是讲巨大披萨故事的时候 小铬

translation.en: And that will never happen!
Silence! I need to think! Just calm down and...
translation.zh: ‎安静！我需要思考 给我冷静

translation.en: Computer, did you put The Tallest on hold?
translation.zh: ‎计算机？ ‎你让最高陛下待机暂停了吗？

translation.en: -[Computer] Nope. -[screams]
I don't think they heard anything. Yes, they did.
translation.zh:
‎-我觉得他们什么都没听到
‎-不 他们听到了

translation.en: I am Irk's finest Invader.
If The Tallest find out I failed to dominate the Earth
translation.zh:
‎如果最高陛下发现
‎我因为忘记第二阶段

translation.en: because I forgot Phase Two,
who knows what they'll do?
translation.zh: ‎天知道他们会做出什么事来

translation.en: [Almighty Tallest Red] Invader Zim,
you were once our best, most amazing Invader,
translation.zh: ‎你曾经是我们最出类拔萃的入侵者

translation.en: but now, you're dumb.
Also, stupid.
As punishment, you will be stripped of your Invader rank,
translation.zh: ‎作为惩罚 你要被剥夺入侵者头衔

translation.en: re-encoded as nothing.
But you can't! I am Zim!
[Almighty Tallest Red] Control Brains, re-encode.
[Control Brains] Re-encoding.
It is done, My Tallest.
Zim, you will live out
translation.zh: ‎邪慕？ ‎你接下来漫长悲哀的岁月将会…

translation.en: the rest of your long, sad days as--
translation.zh: ‎你接下来漫长悲哀的岁月将会…

translation.en: -[crowd cheers] -Wait, no, never mind.
GIR, time is of the essence. -The Tallest could be here any day now... -[gasps]
translation.zh:
‎小铬 时间至关重要
‎最高陛下随时会来

translation.en: ...and Dib won't stay a chair forever.
Go to my scheming lab, and bring me everything that could be Phase Two.
translation.zh:
‎去我的阴谋实验室
‎把任何可能是第二阶段的东西拿来

translation.en: -Quickly! -[squeals]
Useless dookie!
I need more time to remember Phase Two.
translation.zh: ‎我需要更多时间来想起第二阶段

translation.en: Computer, how much longer do I have before The Tallest arrive?
translation.zh: ‎计算机 最高陛下驾到前还有多久？

translation.en: -[grunts] -[Computer] Information unknown. Unacceptable.
Access The Tallest's computers and retrieve their flight plan.
translation.zh:
‎进入最高陛下的计算机
‎检索他们的飞行计划

translation.en: [Computer imitating British accent] Ooh, yes, right away, sir.
translation.zh: ‎遵命 马上照办 长官

translation.en: [Zim] Are you doing an accent?
[Computer in normal accent] I get bored.
P.S. There is insufficient power to access the flight plan.
translation.zh: ‎没有足够电力存取飞行计划

translation.en: Then find more power, and be sneaky about it.
translation.zh: ‎那就多找些电力 ‎要偷偷摸摸地进行

translation.en: [Computer] Activating sneaky mode.
Sneaking!
Sneaking!
Sneaking!
Sneaking!
[Computer] Flight plan retrieved.
[Zim] Along this line is every world the Irken Armada plans to conquer,
translation.zh:
‎沿着这条线路
‎是怒星舰队计划征服的所有世界

translation.en: but where's Earth?
The Tallest said it was the most important mission of all.
translation.zh: ‎最高陛下说这是最重要的使命

translation.en: Computer, zoom out.
[Computer] Zooming out.
Keep zooming out until you find out how far The Tallest are from Earth.
translation.zh:
‎继续缩小 直到找出
‎最高陛下与地球的距离

translation.en: [Computer] Zooming out. Zooming out.
Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out.
-Hurry it up. -Zooming out.
-Zooming out. -Vámonos!
translation.zh:
‎-快点
‎-正在缩小 ‎咱们动作快点！

translation.en: I must begin Phase Two
before Dib gets back into annoying fighting shape.
translation.zh:
‎迪本恢复烦人的战斗体型之前
‎开始第二阶段

translation.en: [Computer] Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out.
Hmm, I'm sure it's there,
-somewhere. -Zooming out.
Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out.
I was in bad shape, then I got too in shape, now I'm back to normal shape.
translation.zh:
‎我之前身体很差 然后身体太强
‎现在恢复正常体型了！

translation.en: Oh, man, Dib, not the coat.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 迪本 别穿那件外套

translation.en: It makes me look mysterious.
Now, step aside. I've got a Zim to stop.
translation.zh: ‎现在让开 我要去阻止邪慕

translation.en: All right, test children.
These bracelets are just prototypes,
translation.zh:
‎这些手环只是原型
‎所以尽量不要呼吸

translation.en: so try not to breathe or think while the energy field is--
translation.zh:
‎这些手环只是原型
‎所以尽量不要呼吸 ‎也不要思考 静静地让能量场…

translation.en: -[Dib grunts] -What? Oh.
Behold, my boy child!
I can't remember the last time I saw you this excited about science.
translation.zh:
‎我都想不起上次见你
‎这么为科学激动是什么时候了

translation.en: Huh? My new Peace Day edition Membracelet.
translation.zh:
‎-哈？
‎-我的新款膜尔手环和平日特别版

translation.en: Tomorrow at my big keynote event, I reveal it to the world.
translation.zh:
‎明天在我的主题活动中
‎我会向世界宣告

translation.en: And when Peace Day comes,
the children of the Earth will hold hands and...
translation.zh: ‎地球的孩子会手拉着手…等等

translation.en: The alien-hunting briefcase? Oh, son.
Not this nonsense again.
Dad, trying to save the Earth from Zim's alien evil is not nonsense.
translation.zh:
‎爸爸 努力拯救地球
‎免遭外星人邪慕的毒手可不是胡闹

translation.en: Without me, there might not be an Earth to hold hands around.
translation.zh:
‎要是没有我
‎可能就没有地球来手牵手了

translation.en: -[children groaning] -Son, there are no aliens.
I've tried to be patient with your unscientific interests...
translation.zh:
‎我试着耐心对待
‎你那毫无科学根据的兴趣

translation.en: -[children shouting] -...bigfeets, ghosts, vampire-bees...
You saw those sting marks, and you know I eat a lot of honey now.
translation.zh:
‎你看到那些刺针印子了！
‎你知道我现在吃很多蜂蜜！

translation.en: Well, as a man of science, I need proof, and I just haven't seen--
translation.zh:
‎作为讲科学的人 我需要证据
‎但我就是没见到…

translation.en: Proof? Proof?
How do you need more proof than this?
Everything I've collected from my countless battles with Zim,
translation.zh:
‎我收集的一切
‎来自与邪慕不计其数的战斗

translation.en: from my daring travels into the unknown things
translation.zh: ‎来自我进入未知世界的大胆旅行

translation.en: your science has closed its eyes to.
translation.zh: ‎这些都是你的科学视而不见的

translation.en: It makes it very difficult to get to the lawnmower.
That's Tak's ship, an alien spaceship
translation.zh:
‎那是钛克飞船 ‎是我从邪慕的一名外星敌人手上
‎捕获的外星人飞船！

translation.en: I captured from one of Zim's alien enemies.
translation.zh:
‎是我从邪慕的一名外星敌人手上
‎捕获的外星人飞船！

translation.en: Shouldn't spaceships fly?
It will, as soon as it lets me fix it.
translation.zh: ‎它让我修好的话 就能飞了

translation.en: -[metal clangs] -[Tak's ship] Dib, your face is stupid.
[Professor Membrane] It's a fine, fake spaceship you've built there, son, but--
translation.zh:
‎儿子 你造了一艘漂亮的假飞船
‎但是…

translation.en: Fake? It's not...
Dad, nobody believes me,
so I'm used to defending our world on my own,
translation.zh: ‎所以我习惯了单打独斗保卫世界

translation.en: but I wish, just once, you'd have my back.
translation.zh: ‎但我希望这一次 你好歹支持我

translation.en: Wishing isn't very scientific, son.
[Dib] This ends today, Zim!
I'm ready for everything you got!
[announcer on TV] Welcome back once again...
-Uh... -...countdown to Peace Day...
Intruder! Prepare to come on in!
[on TV] I'm Ian Cornish, your host,
translation.zh: ‎我是主持人 伊恩柏威西

translation.en: on this beautiful, sunny day.
And joining us for our countdown to Peace Day
is Bloaty the Pig.
What do you have for us, Bloaty?
translation.zh: ‎给我们带来了什么 肿胀仔？

translation.en: Hey, Zim's evil robot. -Where's Zim? -Mmm-mmm.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 邪慕的坏蛋机器人 邪慕在哪？

translation.en: This my special pizza
I make just for Peace Day.
It got ten kinds of pizza inside the pizza,
translation.zh: ‎在这个披萨里加入了十种披萨

translation.en: so that's pretty good.
Where's Zim?
[crying] I don't know! I worry about that boy so much.
translation.zh: ‎不知道 我好担心那个男孩

translation.en: You want some nachos?
Uh, no, thank you. Hey, keep it down out here.
translation.zh:
‎-不了谢谢
‎-嘿 人类？声音小点

translation.en: I'm trying to be miserable in my cheesy cocoon of misery.
translation.zh:
‎我正试着被紧紧包裹在
‎悲哀的奶酪之中自怨自艾

translation.en: What's going on in here?
-What's all this junk? -[metallic clattering]
Yeah, they're all experiments
that I was hoping would be Phase Two of my plan.
translation.zh: ‎希望用在我计划的第二阶段

translation.en: [Dib] Is that supposed to be my dad?
Oh, hello, son!
Yeah. I figured he could replace
translation.zh: ‎是啊 我以为他能替代你的…

translation.en: your actual dad.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 我以为他能替代你的… ‎生父

translation.en: And then, I don't know,
ground you forever or something.
translation.zh: ‎可能把你永远禁足之类的吧

translation.en: I just couldn't get it to make pudding the way you love so much.
translation.zh:
‎我就是没法让他
‎按照你最喜欢的方式制作布丁

translation.en: -It ruined the illusion! -[bowl clatters]
I don't love pudding. What's that smell?
translation.zh: ‎我不爱吃布丁 ‎那是什么臭味？

translation.en: The smell's all me.
What you gonna do about it? [blows raspberry]
I'm gonna lock you up, is what!
[groans] Fine, I don't care.
Wait, really? Why?
[Zim] This is the flight path of the Irken Armada.
And there,
shmillions of light years away from that path
translation.zh: ‎距离那条路线数百万光年之外

translation.en: is Earth.
Do you see what this means, human?
translation.zh: ‎明白这是什么意思吗 人类？

translation.en: That your leaders only fly in a straight line?
translation.zh: ‎等等 你的领导只飞直线吗？

translation.en: The Tallest aren't coming!
-So, you really give up? -[whimpering]
I actually finally win?
Earth is safe.
I've lost the respect of My Tallest!
Come on, man.
[Professor Membrane] There may come a time when we at Membrane Labs
translation.zh:
‎可能会有一天… ‎膜尔实验室的我们
‎不再让世界更美妙…

translation.en: stop making the world more amazing.
translation.zh:
‎膜尔实验室的我们
‎不再让世界更美妙…

translation.en: You know, my dad doesn't respect what I do, either.
[Professor Membrane] That time is not now.
He thinks I'm crazy like the rest of the world,
translation.zh: ‎他觉得我和世界上的其他人一样疯狂

translation.en: the world I just saved without anybody knowing.
translation.zh: ‎我刚才悄悄救下来的这个世界

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Tomorrow, at the Membrane Labs Keynote,
translation.zh: ‎…明天 在膜尔实验室主题活动中

translation.en: we make history again.
Membrane Labs. Who wants a better everything?
translation.zh:
‎膜尔实验室
‎谁想要更好的一切？

translation.en: -[pig squeals] -Wait a minute, the keynote.
Dad's announcing the new Membracelet tomorrow.
translation.zh: ‎我爸明天要宣布新款膜尔手环

translation.en: The whole world'll be watching.
If I could somehow take control of Dad's keynote stream,
translation.zh: ‎如果我能控制爸爸的主题活动数据流

translation.en: I can expose a real alien, you, live in front of the entire planet.
translation.zh:
‎就能曝光一个真正的外星人
‎“你当着整个星球的面撒谎了”

translation.en: [as Professor Membrane in strange accent] I believe you, Dib.
I'm sorry I ever doubted you.
Whoo! Yeah, yeah!
You just might still be good for something, Zim.
translation.zh: ‎看来你终究还有点用处 邪慕

translation.en: What do you say?
[Zim] Fine. I don't care.
[Professor Membrane] Ladies and gentlemen,
I am so very proud to announce...
the new Peace Day edition Membracelet!
translation.zh: ‎新款膜尔手环和平日特别版！

translation.en: Dib,
why is Zim here?
Don't worry about it, Gaz.
It's... I'll explain later.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 贾斯 就是… ‎我晚点解释

translation.en: This is Dad's big night.
Don't even think of doing anything dumb, or--
Gaz, don't worry. Just go.
translation.zh:
‎-不然…
‎-贾斯 别担心 走吧

translation.en: Enjoy the show.
I'm sure it's gonna be something special.
Whew. Okay, Zim. Did you use your alien stuff to take over the control room?
translation.zh:
‎好了 邪慕 你用外星装置
‎拿下控制室了吗？

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Give me a minute.
[Professor Membrane] ...apps such as Peanut Simulator...
[Zim] I updated your bracelet.
-[blob squeaks] -Just hit that button, and you'll be in control of everything.
translation.zh: ‎按下那个按钮 你就能控制一切了

translation.en: Is this update squeaking? -I guess so. -[blob squeaks]
translation.zh:
‎-这个升级在吱吱叫吗？
‎-我猜是吧

translation.en: I can't believe I'm saying it, but this is your greatest work ever.
translation.zh:
‎不敢相信我会这样说
‎但这是你干得最好的事情了

translation.en: Eh.
As you know, tomorrow is Peace Day,
translation.zh: ‎你们知道 明天是和平日

translation.en: and nobody is as excited for the big celebration as I am.
translation.zh: ‎对于这个大庆典 没人像我一样激动

translation.en: [man] I am! [Professor Membrane] Not scientifically possible!
Children. We discovered they generate
translation.zh: ‎儿童 我们发现他们会生成一种

translation.en: an energy field of limitless, chaotic potential.
translation.zh: ‎儿童 我们发现他们会生成一种 ‎无限的混乱的潜在能量场

translation.en: We call that child energy "Childergy."
translation.zh: ‎我们称那种儿童能量为 ‎“熊娃能量

translation.en: The new Membracelet harnesses that childergy
translation.zh: ‎新款膜尔手环能约束那种熊娃能量

translation.en: and channels it outward as pure peace and joy.
translation.zh: ‎新款膜尔手环能约束那种熊娃能量 ‎将其导出为纯粹的和平 ‎和喜悦

translation.en: -[all] Ooh. -[Professor Membrane] Tomorrow, -children will hold hands... -[bracelet chirps] ...encircling the planet in Membracelets
translation.zh:
‎明天 儿童们会戴着膜尔手环
‎手拉手环绕地球

translation.en: to bring about a peace unlike any -the world has ever known. -[cheers and applause]
translation.zh: ‎为这个世界带来前所未有的和平

translation.en: Get ready to see the truth, world, but specifically, Dad.
translation.zh:
‎准备看到真相吧 世界
‎但确切地说是我爸来看

translation.en: Huh?
Oh, no.
Greetings, fellow humans.
Zim? Wait, what?
Where's my dad?
I'm, eh, Professor Zim.
Oh, so that other guy just retired and put me in charge,
translation.zh:
‎另外那个家伙退休了 ‎让我负责
‎我对手环做了一些激动人心的新改动

translation.en: and I just made some exciting new changes to the bracelet.
translation.zh:
‎让我负责
‎我对手环做了一些激动人心的新改动

translation.en: -[woman] Eww! -[man] No!
Wait! Zim's an alien!
-[crowd gasps] -[man] No!
[in Zim's pre-recorded voice] He's so cool.
We should all do everything he says, no matter how evil it sounds.
translation.zh:
‎不论听起来多么邪恶
‎我们应该完全按照他说的做

translation.en: Hail Zim!
Yes, be joyous, you fools.
translation.zh: ‎是的 开心起来 你们这些蠢货

translation.en: Buy my bracelet, and get ready for the most peaceful Peace Day
translation.zh: ‎买我的手环 做好准备迎接

translation.en: your grotesque eyeballs have ever seen!
translation.zh:
‎你们怪诞的眼珠子前所未见的
‎最和平的和平日吧！

translation.en: The bracelet comes in four colors!
[screaming] No!
Please say that was just a horrible nightmare.
translation.zh: ‎请说那只是一个恐怖的噩梦

translation.en: -[Professor Membrane] Son! -Dad?
Breakfast is ready.
Yes! Yes! Yes, yes!
Good morning, Da... Oh, no!
Happy Peace Day, son! You is grounded forever.
translation.zh:
‎和平日快乐 儿子！
‎你被永久禁足了！

translation.en: Bweakfast is da most science-y meal of da day.
translation.zh: ‎早餐是一天中最科学的一餐

translation.en: Pudding. If Foodio 3000 could just perhaps--
No, foody guy! I taking care of it.
These my kids and science and stuff.
translation.zh: ‎这是我的孩纸和科学和东西

translation.en: Gaz, I'm so sorry. Zim tricked me.
translation.zh: ‎贾斯 对不起 邪慕坑了我

translation.en: I didn't mean for any of this to-- What?
You didn't mean to ruin Dad's big show,
translation.zh:
‎你不是有意毁掉爸爸的盛大活动
‎让他被绑架

translation.en: get him kidnapped, and hand Zim the keys
translation.zh:
‎你不是有意毁掉爸爸的盛大活动
‎让他被绑架 ‎还把膜尔实验室的钥匙交给邪慕
‎同时害得你和我

translation.en: to Membrane Labs while you and I are held prisoner
translation.zh:
‎还把膜尔实验室的钥匙交给邪慕
‎同时害得你和我

translation.en: by something that looks like Dad having an allergic reaction
translation.zh:
‎被某个看着像爸爸
‎还对放射性蜜蜂存在过敏反应的家伙

translation.en: to radioactive bees?
Eh, something the matter, honey?
Nah, it's cool, Dad.
How can you be so calm? That thing isn't Dad.
translation.zh:
‎你怎么能如此淡定？
‎那个东西不是爸爸

translation.en: Yeah, look. [softly] Just go along with--
translation.zh: ‎没错 听着 附和它就行了

translation.en: You're not our dad!
Oh, man, here we go.
[gasps] That's a terrible thing to say, son.
Oh, Dib, always kidding. Of course, he's our dad.
translation.zh: ‎迪本老是开玩笑 他当然是我们爸爸

translation.en: Great breakfast, Dad.
-[wailing] -Is it good pudding?
[softly] It's the worst pudding I've ever had in my life.
translation.zh: ‎是我这辈子吃过最难吃的布丁

translation.en: Thanks, honey.
It's not easy taking care of two kids on my own...
translation.zh: ‎独自抚养两个孩子不容易 不过…

translation.en: [grunts] It's so rewarding.
translation.zh: ‎独自抚养两个孩子不容易 不过… ‎很有成就感

translation.en: You're a clone.
Our real dad's been kidnapped by Zim.
translation.zh: ‎我们真正的爸爸被邪慕绑架了

translation.en: Son, it not nice to say bad things about your best friend.
translation.zh: ‎儿子！说你挚友的坏话可不好！

translation.en: Zim is not my best friend.
-He's wonderful. -No, he's the worst.
-You love Zim? -No!
I hate him! He's the most--
translation.zh:
‎-你爱邪慕吗？
‎-不 我恨他… ‎-他是最…
‎-我爱邪慕

translation.en: I love Zim.
[whispers] We need to get out of here. And find Dad, but Clembrane's fast.
translation.zh:
‎-我们要离开这
‎-并且找到爸爸 但克隆膜尔动作很快

translation.en: -Clembrane? -Clone, membrane.
And yeah, I already tried busting out every possible way.
translation.zh:
‎-克隆膜尔？
‎-克隆加上膜尔 ‎我已经试过各种出逃办法了 都不行

translation.en: No luck.
translation.zh: ‎我已经试过各种出逃办法了 都不行

translation.en: You tried escaping without me?
Let's focus on the now, Dib.
Every move I made, he was there to stop me.
translation.zh: ‎不管我有什么举动 他都能阻止我

translation.en: Remember, kids,
translation.zh: ‎孩子们记住 我始终陪在你们身边

translation.en: I'm here for you if you ever need to talk about stuff...
translation.zh: ‎孩子们记住 我始终陪在你们身边 ‎如果你们需要谈论什么…

translation.en: Stay in school. Brush your teeth.
That's good advice, Dad.
-[music plays on TV] -Ooh, it's time for Peace Day now!
[announcer] If you're just tuning in to our Peace Day coverage...
translation.zh: ‎如果把频道换我们和平日的报道

translation.en: ...you're watching Zim, the new head of Membrane Labs,
translation.zh: ‎你就正在观看 ‎膜尔实验室的新领导 邪慕

translation.en: personally overseeing the sale of his new Membracelet
translation.zh:
‎正从全球部署的最新
‎移动膜尔实验室商店之一

translation.en: from one of the new mobile M-Labs Stores deployed all around the world.
translation.zh: ‎亲自监督新款膜尔手环的销售

translation.en: Yeah! [laughs] -Yeah! -[bird squawks]
translation.zh:
‎（膜尔实验室店员说
‎踩踏人数“正常”）

translation.en: So, this show is just Zim laughing the whole time?
translation.zh: ‎那么 这个节目就是邪慕全程大笑？

translation.en: [announcer] And that concludes the laughing portion of the program.
translation.zh: ‎这句话结束了节目的大笑环节

translation.en: People of Earth, of which I am one,
translation.zh: ‎地球上的人类啊 ‎我也是其中一员 因为我是人类

translation.en: because I am human and inferior and disgusting
translation.zh: ‎我也是其中一员 因为我是人类 ‎并且我和你们一样低劣恶心

translation.en: just like you are, Happy Peace Day!
translation.zh: ‎并且我和你们一样低劣恶心 ‎祝你们和平日快乐

translation.en: My amazing new Peace Day Bracelet is a huge success!
translation.zh: ‎我优秀的新款和平日手环大获成功

translation.en: You, barely sentient bag of meat and juice,
translation.zh: ‎你 愚蠢无知的行尸走肉

translation.en: what do you think of my new bracelet?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得我的新款手环怎么样？

translation.en: I love it!
It's a lot more alive than I expected, though.
[chuckles] It sure is.
Already, children around the world are beginning to hold hands.
translation.zh: ‎全世界的儿童已经开始手拉手

translation.en: Soon, the ring of children will connect right here,
translation.zh: ‎很快 儿童之环就会在这里相连

translation.en: and my greatest plan shall be revealed!
[announcer] He really does seem to love his job.
translation.zh: ‎他看起来真的很爱这份工作

translation.en: Wait a minute. That place looks familiar.
translation.zh: ‎等一下 那个地方看着眼熟

translation.en: Is that...
Zim!
Get off my lawn!
Hi, Dib!
What are you doing here?
I live here!
You're gonna have to speak up!
You won't get away with this!
What?
-You won't get a-- -What?
-You won't get awa-- -What?
-You won't get away-- -What?
-You-- -What?
Dib, check out how huge your head looks on TV.
translation.zh: ‎迪本 看看你脑袋在电视上有多大

translation.en: I'm here for you, buddy. Come here.
[Zim] Work harder, children.
-Harder! -[children grunting]
[Zim] Don't you want world peace?
Work harder for Zim.
-[laughs maniacally] -[angry meowing]
translation.zh: ‎（邻家小猫痛恨和平 儿童伤心）

translation.en: [laughing] Hi, Dib.
Look at them, GIR.
All this time trying to subjugate the humans,
translation.zh: ‎我长久以来都试图征服人类

translation.en: and all I had to do was charge them for it.
translation.zh: ‎原来只用收他们的钱就行了

translation.en: But the children of Earth are letting me down.
I need you to use the power of your Irken robot brain
translation.zh: ‎我需要你使用怒星机器人大脑的能量

translation.en: to create a song about peace.
One so inspiring, the children will have no choice but to peace harder!
translation.zh: ‎要非常鼓舞人心 让儿童别无选择 ‎只能更努力地制造和平

translation.en: Like this?
-Mmm-hmm? -No, GIR.
-[gasps] -Try again.
I think I know.
Yes. Yes.
[singing] ♪ Peace is nice ♪ ♪ Peace is nice ♪
♪ Peace is better than ♪ ♪ Chicken and rice! ♪
♪ Peace, peace, peace ♪ ♪ Nice, nice, nice ♪
translation.zh:
‎和平、和平、和平
‎好评、好评、好评

translation.en: ♪ Peace, peace Chicken, chicken ♪ ♪ Rice, rice, rice ♪
translation.zh: ‎和平赞啊赞 鸡肉饭啊饭

translation.en: [all singing] ♪ Peace is nice ♪ ♪ Peace is nice ♪
♪ Peace is better than ♪ ♪ Chicken and rice! ♪
♪ Peace, peace, peace ♪
translation.zh:
‎和平、和平、和平
‎好评、好评、好评

translation.en: [all] ♪ Rice, rice, rice ♪
translation.zh: ‎和平赞啊赞 鸡肉饭啊饭

translation.en: ♪ Peace is nice ♪ ♪ Peace is nice ♪
♪ Peace is better than ♪ ♪ Chicken and rice ♪
♪ Peace, peace, peace ♪ -[siren chirps] -[meows sadly]
translation.zh:
‎和平、和平、和平
‎好评、好评、好评

translation.en: ♪ Peace, peace Chicken, chicken ♪ ♪ Rice, rice, rice ♪
translation.zh: ‎和平赞啊赞 鸡肉饭啊饭

translation.en: ♪ Peace is nice... ♪
[Zim] It's working!
It's working!
Stop!
Zim's done something to the bracelets!
Don't hold hands!
Relax. It's Zim we're talking about.
translation.zh:
‎放松吧 ‎咱们说的可是邪慕啊
‎不管他计划了什么

translation.en: Whatever he's got planned, it's not gonna work.
translation.zh:
‎咱们说的可是邪慕啊
‎不管他计划了什么 ‎都不可能奏效的

translation.en: No!
Ha! Nothing happened, Zim!
Of course nothing happened, human.
translation.zh: ‎当然没有事情发生啦 人类

translation.en: It's not enough to simply attach a space-phasing alien horror blob
translation.zh:
‎单给这些手环加上
‎太空相变外星恐怖粘团

translation.en: to these bracelets.
"Space phasing"?
You'd also need something with the power to harness the dark energy of space
translation.zh: ‎还需要可以约束太空暗能量的动力

translation.en: to activate them.
Only one being in the known universe has such a power.
translation.zh: ‎整个宇宙中只有一个东西有这种动力

translation.en: My creation, Minimoose.
[men chanting] ♪ Minimoose ♪
Behold my victory!
Look at me being wrong. What have you done, Zim?
translation.zh:
‎-我居然判断错了
‎-你做了什么 邪慕？

translation.en: I've teleported the Earth to a part of space
translation.zh: ‎我… ‎把地球直接传送到怒星舰队路径中了

translation.en: directly in the path of the Irken Armada.
translation.zh: ‎把地球直接传送到怒星舰队路径中了

translation.en: Now The Tallest have to visit me next.
translation.zh: ‎现在最高陛下的下一站必须来拜访我

translation.en: -Where's our dad? -You what?
I can't believe I fell for your sad, shmoopy act!
translation.zh: ‎不敢相信我居然会同情你的悲伤伎俩

translation.en: My shmoop was no act.
I truly felt I had failed The Tallest,
translation.zh: ‎我真心觉得让最高陛下失望了

translation.en: but then you told me about the power of the bracelet,
translation.zh: ‎但你告诉我手环的能量之后

translation.en: inspiring me. It's funny, really. -Laughter, GIR. -[giggles]
translation.zh: ‎我受到启发 真的很有趣 小铬快笑

translation.en: And I owe it all to--
I smell pudding.
...to you!
Is that part of your brilliant plan, Zim?
translation.zh: ‎那是你精妙计划的一部分吗 邪慕？

translation.en: Eh, probably.
I mean, I'm so incredible, even I don't know everything I do.
translation.zh:
‎我太出色了
‎有时候我都不知道自己在做什么

translation.en: Computer, what is that thing in space that just happened?
translation.zh: ‎计算机 ‎太空中刚才出现的是什么东西？

translation.en: [Computer] Thing is a Florpus Hole
translation.zh: ‎这“东西”是非常愚蠢地传送整个星球

translation.en: created by the incredibly stupid teleportation of an entire planet.
translation.zh: ‎这“东西”是非常愚蠢地传送整个星球 ‎所产生的黑洞

translation.en: And is "Florpus Hole" as cool as it sounds?
[Computer] Florpus Hole will suck in all nearby worlds,
wherein they will collide violently with alternate realities.
translation.zh: ‎它们会在异世界中暴力碰撞

translation.en: There, you see? It's just a shmorpus hole.
Besides, The Tallest'll get here long before there's any trouble.
translation.zh: ‎再说 出问题之前最高陛下早就到了

translation.en: Zim, that Florpus is gonna destroy the Earth, you included!
translation.zh: ‎邪慕 黑洞会摧毁地球 包括你在内

translation.en: If you're so worried about the Florpus, just get your dad to help.
translation.zh: ‎要是这么担心黑洞 就去找你爸啊

translation.en: I'm over here, everybody.
He's only a shmillion light years away
translation.zh: ‎他就在数百万光年之外的烤肉10号

translation.en: on Moo-Ping 10, also known as
translation.zh: ‎他就在数百万光年之外的烤肉10号 ‎亦称太空监狱！

translation.en: Space Prison!
Why don't you hop in your spaceship and go rescue him?
translation.zh: ‎不妨跳进你们的宇宙飞船去救他？

translation.en: Oh, wait, you don't have a spaceship!
translation.zh: ‎等等 你们没有宇宙飞船！

translation.en: [clears throat] Lawrence! Now, if you'll excuse me, I've got some Tall company on the way.
translation.zh:
‎劳伦斯！
‎现在告辞 最高陛下们要来了！

translation.en: Zim!
[comms officer] My Tallest?
Something appears to have appeared in our path.
translation.zh: ‎似乎有某种东西… ‎出现在我们的路线中

translation.en: What is it?
A terrifying, deadly space anomaly.
-Mmm-hmm, mmm-hmm, interesting. -Mmm, yeah, okay.
As well as the planet Earth.
Earth? That means Zim! This is the worst news I've ever heard.
translation.zh:
‎地球？那意味着邪慕！
‎这是我听到过的最糟糕的消息

translation.en: Sirs, we still have quite a bit of time to change course.
translation.zh: ‎长官们 咱们还有一点时间来改道

translation.en: But we're going straight. Yeah. Turning's no fun.
translation.zh:
‎-但我们要走直线
‎-是的 转弯不好玩

translation.en: Why is this happening? Make it not happen.
translation.zh: ‎为什么会出这种事？让它别发生

translation.en: It's been ten years, Gaz.
Ten long years trapped in this house with the pudding monster.
translation.zh: ‎在这栋屋子里被布丁怪物困了十年

translation.en: It's been two days, but yeah.
How come you kids don't play with the science puppy I made for you?
translation.zh:
‎你们俩干嘛不玩
‎我给你们做的科学小狗？

translation.en: -[Dib] Because it's pudding. -[dog barks] I hate this as much as you do,
translation.zh:
‎-因为那是布丁
‎-我也跟你一样痛恨这些

translation.en: but it's not like anyone can just walk out the front door.
Okay, it's not like we can just walk out the front door,
translation.zh: ‎好吧 咱们没法走出大门

translation.en: but maybe we can... Hmm.
Hey, Dad.
Stop calling him "Dad!"
[narrator] Now, pay close attention to that ham,
'cause it's not the last time you're gonna see that ham in the story.
translation.zh:
‎因为这不是在这个故事中
‎最后一次见到那个火腿

translation.en: -[muffled grunting] -Dad, you and Dib need more father-son time together.
translation.zh: ‎爸爸 你和迪本需要一些父子时间

translation.en: Just look at him. He's all messed up, needs more quality time with you.
translation.zh:
‎你瞧瞧他 他一团糟
‎需要和你过一些品质时光

translation.en: Ooh, I see what you mean. You got any suggestions?
translation.zh: ‎我了解你的意思 你有什么建议吗？

translation.en: This was a good idea, honey.
Science projects bring families together. How can I help you, son?
translation.zh:
‎科学计划能让家庭更团结
‎有何可以效劳的 儿子？

translation.en: You need me to put some science pudding on it?
translation.zh: ‎你需要我把科学布丁弄上去吗？

translation.en: Uh, maybe later.
You just keep stirring, uh, Dad.
[Tak's ship] Festering human, you have stolen me away from my rightful owner!
translation.zh:
‎糜烂的人类！
‎你把我从合法主人手中偷走！

translation.en: Look, ship, I get that you don't like me and all, but we need your help.
translation.zh:
‎听着 飞船 我明白你不喜欢我
‎但我们需要你的帮助

translation.en: [Tak's ship] I don't help anyone but Tak.
See? It's no use.
-You hate Dib, right? -Affirmative.
But you hate Zim even more. Correct.
I see where you're going with this.
Helping us break our dad out of Moopington would--
translation.zh: ‎帮我们将爸爸救出烤肉镇就可以…

translation.en: Wait, do you mean Moo-Ping 10?
Right.
It would make Zim super unhappy.
[Tak's ship] Flawless logic. I will help you.
translation.zh: ‎逻辑无懈可击 我会帮你们的

translation.en: [both] Yes!
-[Tak's ship] On one condition. -What's that?
Disconnect my seat sensors so I don't feel your terrible human butts in me.
translation.zh:
‎断开我的座位感应器 我就觉察不到
‎体内有你们糟糕的人类屁股了

translation.en: Deal.
We did it, kids. Hurray for science.
translation.zh: ‎成功了 孩子们 为科学喝彩！

translation.en: Right. Now, about that pudding...
Don't wait up for us, Clembrane!
translation.zh: ‎不用等我们了 克隆膜尔！

translation.en: [both] Yeah!
-[Florpus Hole crackling] -[Tak's ship] Oh. You guys have a deadly Florpus Hole now.
-That's new. -[Dib] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-这可是新消息
‎-快点 飞船

translation.en: -Let's hurry, ship. -Don't tell me what to do.
translation.zh:
‎-这可是新消息
‎-快点 飞船 ‎少对我颐指气使 不过好的

translation.en: But okay.
translation.zh: ‎少对我颐指气使 不过好的

translation.en: Now, this is what I like to see, GIR.
Pathetic humans fleeing in terror at the sight of Zim!
translation.zh: ‎可悲的人类在邪慕眼前惊恐逃窜！

translation.en: [GIR] Nobody even looking at you.
-[car alarm goes off] -It's a show of respect.
Their stupid eyes can't handle all this.
translation.zh: ‎他们愚蠢的眼睛接受不了这些！

translation.en: Anyhow, terrible work on the signs, GIR,
translation.zh: ‎话说回来 这些标志做得很糟 小铬

translation.en: worse than I expected.
Aww, thank you.
Did you build me that throne I asked for?
[Zim] Excellent.
Now, to ascend this throne,
and claim my rightful place as...
Hah! But where are the flames?
translation.zh:
‎但火焰在哪？
‎身后不喷射酷炫火焰的话

translation.en: I can't rule the world without cool flames shooting up behind me.
translation.zh:
‎但火焰在哪？
‎身后不喷射酷炫火焰的话 ‎我就没法统治世界

translation.en: Hit the flames button!
Wait, are those peanuts?
[GIR] Oops.
Try the peanuts button.
[Zim] All right, flames, uh, peanuts,
translation.zh:
‎-试试花生按钮
‎-好吧 ‎火焰？花生？

translation.en: flames, uh, peanuts?
[screams] The peanuts! [laughing] Oh, whoa, whoa.
The Tallest will be so happy!
[The Tallest moaning] We're so unhappy!
Zim's so close, I can almost smell him.
translation.zh: ‎邪慕好近了 我都能闻到他的气味

translation.en: [comms office] Sirs, really, it's no big deal.
translation.zh: ‎长官 真的没什么大不了

translation.en: We can just steer around the--
Wait, why steer around the Earth when we can just blow it up?
translation.zh: ‎明明可以炸掉地球 干嘛绕道？

translation.en: Yeah, we're great at blowing stuff up. -[alert blips] -What is that?
translation.zh: ‎对 我们最擅长炸东西了 那是什么？

translation.en: -[comms officer] It appears to be a-- -Blow it up!
[comms office] But, sirs, there's still the life-destroying space hole to consider.
translation.zh:
‎但是长官 还要考虑
‎摧毁生命的太空黑洞

translation.en: Man, this guy.
[mockingly] "I fly the spaceship, and I sure love steering!"
[mockingly] "Ooh, look at me steering all over the place.
Look at me steering with my wittle steering hands."
I like that we're funny.
-[music stops] -[both] Hey!
[Tak's ship] Your noises are bad. Also, we're here.
Moo-Ping 10,
prison to the galaxy's most infamous criminals.
translation.zh: ‎监禁星系中最臭名昭著罪犯的地方

translation.en: Okay, their defenses are about to go down.
How do you know?
[Tak's ship] Just get ready.
All right, now what?
[Tak's ship] I'll go cause a diversion and come back when you've found your dog.
translation.zh:
‎我去吸引注意力
‎你们找到狗了我再回来

translation.en: -Our dad. -Whatever.
That's our diversion. You ready?
translation.zh: ‎他们被引开了 准备好了吗？

translation.en: I was born ready, Gaz. This spy coat isn't just to look cool.
translation.zh:
‎我天生就准备好了 贾斯
‎这件侦探外套可不只是好看而已

translation.en: -[grunts] -[Dib] Now we'll never find Dad!
translation.zh: ‎现在我们再也找不到爸爸了

translation.en: normally, you crying on the floor is hilarious, but come on.
translation.zh: ‎你在地上哭通常很好笑 但是别气馁

translation.en: It's all my fault, Gaz. [groans]
Why aren't you saying I told you so?
'Cause making fun of you is no fun when you're this sad.
translation.zh:
‎因为你这么伤心的时候
‎取笑你并不好玩

translation.en: You're my brother, man.
I only torment you because I know you can handle it.
translation.zh:
‎我只在知道你能应付的时候
‎才欺负你

translation.en: I've done way worse than throwing you in a space prison.
translation.zh:
‎我做的事情比
‎把你丢进太空监狱糟糕多了

translation.en: This is nothing. Get up!
I was supposed to save the world, Gaz, not help Zim destroy it.
translation.zh:
‎贾斯 我应该拯救世界的
‎而不是帮助邪慕摧毁它

translation.en: I was gonna show people the truth.
I knew if they saw something amazing,
translation.zh: ‎我知道若他们看到一些不可思议的事

translation.en: even if it was horrible, like Zim, people would just wake up,
translation.zh:
‎即便是很糟糕的事情 比如邪慕
‎人们就会醒悟

translation.en: and stop obsessing over all the little things
and see that there was something bigger out there,
something to unite against.
Instead of fighting each other, the world would know there was--
translation.zh: ‎而不是彼此争斗 世界就会知道…

translation.en: [Gaz] Hey, Dib! Shut up and look!
-Dad! -[Professor Membrane] Son!
-[aliens] Aww! -[Professor Membrane] I didn't want to interrupt your lovely, imaginary speech.
translation.zh: ‎我不想打断你动人又有想象力的演讲

translation.en: Imaginary?
Well, the last thing I remember was something hitting me on the head
translation.zh: ‎我最后只记得有东西击中我的头

translation.en: and starting this incredible hallucination.
translation.zh: ‎然后开始产生这种令人不可思的幻想

translation.en: No, this is all really happening.
Zim used your bracelets to teleport the Earth
translation.zh: ‎邪慕利用你的手环 ‎将地球传送到宇宙的另一个地方

translation.en: to another part of the universe!
translation.zh: ‎将地球传送到宇宙的另一个地方

translation.en: Do you know how?
[alien] Uh, he's not gonna know how.
[Professor Membrane] Son, the Membracelet is just for running apps
translation.zh:
‎儿子 膜尔手环只能
‎跑程序和促进世界和平

translation.en: and world peace, but, oh, theoretically...
translation.zh:
‎儿子 膜尔手环只能
‎跑程序和促进世界和平 ‎不过理论上人们可以用它来 比如

translation.en: -[aliens gasp] -...one could use it to, say,
translation.zh: ‎不过理论上人们可以用它来 比如

translation.en: create a galactic star gate of sorts, yes.
translation.zh: ‎创建各种星系之门 是的

translation.en: What?
That's crazy, yo.
Well, we knew it was possible,
but only with the addition of a purely theoretical
translation.zh: ‎但除非加上一团纯属理论上的

translation.en: alien horror blob energized by a purely theoretical
translation.zh:
‎外星恐怖粘团 ‎再由纯属理论上的
‎紫色太空小鹿来激活

translation.en: -tiny purple space moose. -[aliens chuckling]
translation.zh:
‎再由纯属理论上的
‎紫色太空小鹿来激活

translation.en: But all those things don't exist, so we didn't worry about it.
translation.zh:
‎但这些东西都不存在
‎所以我们不曾担心

translation.en: Minimoose!
Dad, if you had that purple space moose, could you use it to teleport the Earth
translation.zh:
‎爸 如果你有那只紫色太空小鹿
‎能把地球传送回

translation.en: back where it belongs?
Theoretically, mmm-hmm.
Too bad we're in prison.
[Tak's ship] Three human butts is too many, so I brought this.
translation.zh:
‎三个人类屁股太可怕了
‎所以我带了这个

translation.en: Hop in.
[Professor Membrane] This is all so real!
translation.zh:
‎-这一切都太真实了
‎-不是幻觉

translation.en: -Not a hallucination. -[Gaz] Shotgun!
translation.zh:
‎-这一切都太真实了
‎-不是幻觉 ‎我要坐前排

translation.en: -[aliens cheering] -[alien] See you later!
Only enough room in there for you guys, I guess.
[Tak's ship] Hang on to your disgusting butts!
What's with you and butts?
[laughs maniacally] Okay, okay. Okay, enough running and screaming. Let's mix it up a bit.
translation.zh:
‎好了！跑够了叫够了
‎咱们混合一下！

translation.en: Maybe bow down before me or something.
Hmm, leaping is good.
[Professor Membrane] Well, that was very convincing.
Because it's real, Dad!
[Professor Membrane] How could anything that horrifying be real?
translation.zh: ‎那么恐怖的东西怎么可能是真的？

translation.en: Dad, the Earth's minutes away from being destroyed!
translation.zh: ‎爸爸 地球几分钟就会被毁灭了

translation.en: Why are you laughing?
[Professor Membrane] Minimoose is a funny name.
[Tak's ship] Normally, I'd say "Don't touch me," but maybe a little help?
translation.zh:
‎通常我会说别碰我
‎但你能帮个忙吗？

translation.en: -[alarms blaring] -[Tak's ship] This isn't good.
Gaz!
[Professor Membrane] Marvelous!
I truly believe I'm falling to a hideous death!
translation.zh: ‎我真的相信我会进入恐怖的死亡

translation.en: Hang on, Dad!
Don't let go!
[Professor Membrane] Don't worry. None of this is real.
-I'll prove everything to you. -[cat meows]
Just hang on!
You'll be proud of me!
[Professor Membrane] Son, you don't have to prove anything.
translation.zh: ‎儿子 你什么都不用证明

translation.en: I'm always proud of you.
Dad!
[Zim] I did it, GIR.
The humans cower in fear before my superior Irken might,
translation.zh:
‎人类在我强大的怒星上级面前
‎恐惧臣服

translation.en: and just in time.
Is that The Tallest I see approa--
Dib?
You...
Give me the moose.
Zim, that moose is the only thing
translation.zh:
‎邪慕！ ‎只有那只鹿可以拯救地球
‎不被你的黑洞毁灭

translation.en: that can save Earth from your Florpus!
translation.zh:
‎只有那只鹿可以拯救地球
‎不被你的黑洞毁灭

translation.en: [grunts] Get your own moose, human! -This one's mine! -[squeaks]
translation.zh:
‎你自己去抓只鹿啊 人类！
‎这只是我的！

translation.en: Hah, I think you're cool too, Minimoose.
translation.zh: ‎哈！我觉得你也很酷 小鹿！

translation.en: [Dib] Stop! We're running out of time!
[Zim] You're ugly when you lie, Dib!
translation.zh: ‎你撒谎的时候很丑 迪本

translation.en: [Dib] I'm not lying! [Zim] Then why are you ugly?
translation.zh:
‎-我没撒谎
‎-那你为什么这么丑？

translation.en: -Give me the moose. -No! -Give me the moose. -No! -Give me the moose. -No!
[Zim] I liked you better when you were a chair!
And I liked you better when you were a toilet!
I was not a toilet!
[Dib grunting] Leprechaun cat, no--
I was hiding in the toilet.
Zim!
No!
Well, he's dead.
GIR, all this evil is doing a number on my throat.
Fetch me a soothing lozenge!
Dad!
[Professor Membrane] Why are you wearing those shirts?
I never hired any of you!
[Professor Membrane] Don't worry, son.
I've got your back.
Spencer! Devon!
-Maria! -[Professor Membrane] Come on!
Lawrence!
No!
GIR, avenge your robot brothers and Maria.
translation.zh:
‎小铬！为你的兄弟们复仇！
‎以及玛丽亚

translation.en: Yes, my master!
You're terrible, GIR!
It's over, Zim.
-[sips] -Oh, it is?
Well, now I'm sad. Wait! Have you forgotten?
translation.zh: ‎现在我伤心了 等等！忘了他了吗？

translation.en: You're grounded!
-And you, get away from my son! -[choking]
-[babbles] -...what's happening? -[babbles] -What is this thing?
-He's you, Dad. -[Professor Membrane] What?
translation.zh:
‎他是你 爸爸 ‎-什么？
‎-谁是我 儿子？我是我 但那是谁？

translation.en: Who's me, son? I'm me.
translation.zh:
‎-什么？
‎-谁是我 儿子？我是我 但那是谁？

translation.en: But who's that? Pudding break.
translation.zh:
‎-什么？
‎-谁是我 儿子？我是我 但那是谁？ ‎布丁休息时间

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] I'm very confused right now.
[Zim] So, it has been revealed.
You've discovered the clone is not actually
your real father!
You told me he wasn't my real father.
translation.zh: ‎你告诉过我他不是我真正的爸爸

translation.en: Pudding break over. [Professor Membrane] Oh, this feels so real!
translation.zh:
‎-布丁休息时间结束
‎-哦！这种感觉好真实！

translation.en: -We need that moose, Dad! -[crashes in distance]
[laughs] Nothing's uglier than moose jealousy, Dib.
translation.zh:
‎没什么比为了鹿争风吃醋更丑陋了
‎迪本 搞什么…

translation.en: Ooh, what the... Where did--
translation.zh:
‎没什么比为了鹿争风吃醋更丑陋了
‎迪本 搞什么… ‎到底在哪…

translation.en: [Tak's ship] Yours is the worst... [glitching] butt of them... butt of them all, Zim.
translation.zh: ‎你的屁股是最烂的 邪慕

translation.en: Dib!
Do you still have that ham I gave you?
Of course!
The ham!
[narrator] See? There's that ham again.
[Professor Membrane] Great work, honey, but...
Oops.
Honey, fighting doodn't solve anything.
Also, I found this little moose thing. Look at it. Isn't it funny?
translation.zh: ‎我还找到这只小鹿 看啊！可爱吧？

translation.en: I command you to return the moose
and destroy the Membrane family!
But... they my family.
And that guy, it's like looking into a mirror.
translation.zh: ‎而且那个人 跟我就像照镜子

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Oh, I don't know about-- [grunts angrily] I should've known you'd fail me!
translation.zh:
‎-我不知道…
‎-我就该知道你会让我失望的

translation.en: You couldn't even learn to make pudding the right way.
Hey! You leave Clembrane alone!
Yeah! [in British accent] It's the best pudding I've ever had in my life.
translation.zh: ‎没错 那是我吃过的最好的布丁

translation.en: Excellent. Now, just...
-No! -[squeals]
[gasps] It's happening!
Use the moose!
[Professor Membrane] Uh, right. Use the moose.
Um, okay.
Everyone, hold hands again.
[Gaz in normal accent] Yeah! Your lives depend on it!
Okay! Hold my hand.
No way! Be serious!
translation.zh: ‎休想！认真点 现在大家加油

translation.en: Now, come on, everyone. Faster!
translation.zh: ‎休想！认真点 现在大家加油 ‎快点！

translation.en: I did my best.
It's no use, Dib.
You've lost. The Irken Armada is already here.
translation.zh: ‎你输了 怒星舰队已经到了

translation.en: Forward cannons now at full power.
[Professor Membrane] Almost have it.
Dad, hurry!
We're entering the Florpus!
[Zim] Zim has won!
No pressure, Dad,
translation.zh: ‎不要有压力 爸爸 但是…

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Cut me some slack! This is my first moose!
translation.zh: ‎别这么严格 这是我的第一只鹿！

translation.en: Relax. [in distorted voice] It's just realities colliding like my computer said.
translation.zh:
‎放松 就像我计算机说的
‎这只是现实碰撞而已

translation.en: [in distorted voice] And tearing Earth apart, you moron!
translation.zh: ‎而且会把地球撕裂的 你这个蠢货！

translation.en: [stammers] Oh, no.
[Professor Membrane] I've got it!
My Tallest, the Earth...
It's gone.
That's great news.
-Crisis averted. -Hurray!
translation.zh: ‎避开危机了 ‎万岁！现在我们不用转弯了

translation.en: Now we don't have to turn.
[comms officer] Sirs, there's still the horrifying space hole straight ahead.
translation.zh: ‎长官 正前方还有恐怖的太空黑洞

translation.en: [Almighty Tallest Purple] Why are you so negative?
[The Tallest] Yay! Whoo-hoo!
-[Almighty Tallest Purple] Yeah-- -[electricity buzzes]
[Professor Membrane] Now, prepare your eating faces
for incalculable nutrition!
translation.zh: ‎享受无法估算的丰富营养吧！

translation.en: Good work, Foodio.
Thank you, Gazlene.
I hope you can taste the love simulation I made it with.
translation.zh: ‎希望你们能尝出我做饭时的模拟爱

translation.en: -[heavy footsteps approach] -[Clembrane] Just one final ingwedient.
[laughs] Family and pudding and science and wobots and stuff.
-So, does he live here now or what? -[Gaz grunts]
translation.zh: ‎他现在是住这了还是怎么的？

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] I'm still very confused. -[laughs] -[chuckles]
Enjoying your losers' meal, eh, Dib?
translation.zh: ‎失败者的食物好吃吗 迪本？

translation.en: "Losers"? Your plan failed.
Did it, Dib? Did it?
What if I told you my plan all along
translation.zh: ‎如果我告诉你 我的计划

translation.en: was to steal this whatever-it-is?
translation.zh: ‎如果我告诉你 我的计划 ‎一直是偷走这个 管它是什么！

translation.en: Phase Two. It was Phase Two all along.
translation.zh: ‎第二阶段 第二阶段一直就是这个

translation.en: Is that the ceramic clown puppy from our living room?
translation.zh: ‎那是我们起居室的陶瓷小丑狗吗？

translation.en: Who's laughing now, Dib?
I am, see? [laughing]
[Professor Membrane] Why didn't you invite your little green friend in for dinner, son?
translation.zh:
‎儿子 干嘛不邀请
‎你的小绿朋友来吃饭呢？

translation.en: Dad, that was Zim, the alien who almost destroyed the world, remember?
translation.zh:
‎爸！那是邪慕
‎差点毁灭世界的外星人 记得吗？

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Son, of course I remember.
I remember getting hit on the head and dreaming up all that crazy stuff.
translation.zh:
‎我记得脑子被打了
‎而且梦见那些很疯狂的东西

translation.en: What?
What's happening? Is everything over?
translation.zh:
‎-怎么啦？一切结束了吗？
‎-是的 小铬

translation.en: Yes, GIR, I'm just waiting for The Tallest
translation.zh:
‎-怎么啦？一切结束了吗？
‎-是的 小铬 ‎我正在等最高陛下接这通电话

translation.en: to answer this call so I can tell them all about my success.
translation.zh: ‎我正在等最高陛下接这通电话 ‎我就能告诉他们我的胜利

translation.en: Did we win? Did we win? Did we win? Did we win?
Did we win? Did we win? Did we win? Did we win? Did we win? Did we win?
-[inhales] -[screams] Did we win?
Of course. Zim always wins...
No thanks to you working with the enemy.
translation.zh: ‎没有赢啦 因为你勾结敌人

translation.en: -[Minimoose squeaks] -Heh, good one, Minimoose. -I can't stay mad at you. -[screen buzzes]
translation.zh: ‎干得好 小鹿 我没法一直生你的气

translation.en: Ah, here we go.
My Tallest, I am pleased to report
translation.zh:
‎最高陛下 我很高兴地汇报
‎我的计划大获成功

translation.en: my plan was a success and I now have Dib's puppy clown thing,
translation.zh:
‎最高陛下 我很高兴地汇报
‎我的计划大获成功 ‎现在迪本的小丑狗在我手上了

translation.en: which was my plan all along.
Does this please you?
That sounded like a yes to me.
Yay! I missed you so much!
